title: Unfiltered: 24 Hours On A 4th Generation Dairy Farm

subtasks: Observing cows being brought into the dairy
Using a hydraulic lever to release grain for cows
Watching cows know instinctively how to approach the lever
Understanding the milk collection process (milk directly from udder)
Noting precautions while near potential landmines (e.g., equipment hazard areas)
Preparing for drone footage (adjusting to windy conditions)
